verses.name: Ezekiel 1:7
verses.text: And their feet were straight feet; and the sole of their feet was like the sole of a calf’s foot: and they sparkled like the colour of burnished brass.

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:8
verses.text: And they had the hands of a man under their wings on their four sides; and they four had their faces and their wings.

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:9
verses.text: Their wings were joined one to another; they turned not when they went; they went every one straight forward.
